# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="afcc6-102">將 emoji 新增至電子郵件訊息</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="afcc6-103">您可以在郵件中插入 emoji。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="afcc6-104">回復現有的電子郵件，或選取 [ **新增郵件**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="afcc6-105">選取 [ **插入 emoji** ] 按鈕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="afcc6-106">在 [撰寫] 視窗的底部，開啟 [運算式] 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="afcc6-107">搜尋並選擇您想要插入的表情符號或 GIF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="afcc6-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
